title: Spiced lamb rack with spinach, chickpeas and crème fraîche dressing
ingredients: 1 x 4-bone lamb racks French trimmed (ask your butcher to prepare this for you)
1½ tsp coriander seeds, toasted, ground to a powder
½ tsp coriander seeds, toasted, ground to a powder
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
